name: Cockroach in the Kitchen
description:
How to Play:

Can you reach the giant hamburger that awaits you on the other side of the kitchen? 

You're a slippery (and hungry) little fella who's got the unique ability to swap between different dimensional planes! You'll need to quickly make your way through many different obstacles by running, jumping, and switching perspectives to get that burger. Be warned, however, some objects are only passable under specific circumstances and require careful thought  before you act.

  • Tips:
    • Red objects are 3D while blue objects are 2D
    • Sponges are sticky, so they take you to and from the 2D plane.
  • During 3D:
    • Movement- WASD
    • Jump- Spacebar
    • Change view- F
  • During 2D:
    • Movement- AD
    • Jump- Spacebar
    • Change view- F
